post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in Los Angeles and here's our new offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our Los Angeles Node and not on the North Carolina Node or Baltimore Node !

All the Los Angeles VPS's come with,
100 Mbit Shared line
Dedicated RAM 
4 (8 HT Cores) Shared Cores of Intel Xeon E3-1230 Processor at 3.2 Ghz each core and 3.6 Ghz Max Turbo Frequency ! 
1 Static IPv4
SolusVM

OpenVZ Yearly Plan Details :
512 MB Guaranteed RAM
512 MB vSWAP
20 GB HDD
Unmetered 100 Mbit/sec bandwidth
SolusVM Control Panel
4 (8 HT Cores) Shared Cores of Intel Xeon E3-1230 Processor at 3.2 Ghz each core and 3.6 Ghz Max Turbo Frequency !

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=31

Test IP : 198.136.28.50
Test File : 198.136.28.50/100mb.test
Location : Los Angeles, California, USA
IPv6 Info : No ETA as yet from the DC, but should be coming soon ;)
Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos
Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 12 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you, All VPS's on the Los Angeles Node come with a 100 Mbit Shared line.

Supported OS for OpenVZ,
CentOS 6
CentOS 5
Debian 6
Ubuntu 12.04
or any other template from (http://wiki.openvz.org/Download/template/precreated) but only from the "Precreated section"

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Thanks !
